articles.title: Kate Middleton's new look to 'portray herself royal and classic in contrast to Meghan' - Express
articles.description: KATE MIDDLETON, the Duchess of Cambridge, looked sombre and yet glamorous at last Sunday's Remembrance event. She joined Camilla, Duchess of Cornwall, at the Cenotaph wearing Alexander McQueen.

articles.title: Friends fans frenzy after Matthew Perry confirms reunion will be filmed in March - Mirror Online
articles.description: The long-awaited reunion of the Friends cast has been given a filming date again after it was postponed due to the coronavirus pandemic and fans can't get enough of it
articles.content:
Matthew Perry has sent Friends fans into a frenzy by confirming that a highly-anticipated reunion of the hit show has been rescheduled to March.
